grammar.phonology.title: Phonology (Daraŋ Suroŋ)
grammar.phonology.description: Daraŋ phoneme, suroŋ ga naŋ, stress, tone ka intonation.
grammar.morphology.title: Morphology (Kalma Daraŋ)
grammar.morphology.description: Kalma daŋ morpheme seŋ, inflection ka derivation.
grammar.syntax.title: Syntax (Jumla Daraŋ)
grammar.syntax.description: Subject–Verb–Object order, phrase ka clause daraŋ.
grammar.semantics.title: Semantics (Ma’na Daraŋ)
grammar.semantics.description: Kalma ka jumla ma’na, ambiguity ka interpretation.
grammar.pragmatics.title: Pragmatics (Sukut ka Fara)
grammar.pragmatics.description: Ma’na sukut seŋ badil, polite ka implicit meaning.
grammar.lexicon.title: Lexicon (Kalma Daftar)
grammar.lexicon.description: Kalma daftar: idioms ka fixed expression.
grammar.orthography.title: Orthography (Sahifa Daraŋ)
